revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LinkSprite |model=pcDuino |revision=4 Nano |price=20 |est_release_date=09/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=FriendlyARM |manuf_model=NanoPi |manuf_rev=M1 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=H3 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1), |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008B;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 3A, 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, CVBS header, IR receiver, DVP Camera Interface, Microphone, GPIO, SPI, I2C, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2011.09; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.39;Debian 8; |tp_firmware=Armbian, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=ls |default_pass=ls }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino4-nano/ Product page]
''"pcDuino4nano" and "2016/08/30"'' is silkscreened between the RAM chips. {{see also|Allwinner|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
*[https://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_M1 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi M1'' on '''SunXi'''] • [[NanoPi M1]] • [[NanoPi M1 Plus]] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/13/20-pcduino4-nano-is-yet-another-allwinner-h3-development-board-sort-of ''pcDuino4 Nano - Allwinner H3 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/pcduino-goes-quad-core-swaps-arduino-for-rpi-compatibility/ ''pcDuino goes quad-core, swaps Arduino for RPi compatibility'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM • [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646D *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0 ports
===See also=== :;[http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino/ pcDuinos Models] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino-family/ Family] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino-download/ Download] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino Lite]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino-lite/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino Lite WiFi]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino-lite-wifi/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino1]] (v1) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino1/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino2]] (v2) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino2/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3B]] (800) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3 Nano]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3-nano/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3S]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3s/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino4 STB]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino4-stb/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino4 Nano]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino4-nano/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino8 STB]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino8-stb/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino8 Uno]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino8-uno/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino9s]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino9s-industry-grade-rk3288-single-board-computer-with-linux-or-android-with-metal-enclosure/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino9 Mini]] (new) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite Arches]] (pcduino8-upper) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-arches/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite Acadia]] (acadia2) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-acadia/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite Canyonlands]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-canyonlands-intel-atom-z3735f-quad-2gb-32gb-wifi-win-8-1-mini-pc/ PPage]
